```{=html}
<script type="module">
  import { JSONEditor } from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-jsoneditor@0.23.4/dist/vanilla-jsoneditor.js";

  const container = document.getElementById("jsoneditor");
  const pretty = document.getElementById("pretty");

  const editor = new JSONEditor({
    target: container,
    props: {
      content: {
        json: {
          hello: "world",
          n: 42
        }
      },
      onChange: (updated) => {
        try {
          const formatted = JSON.stringify(updated.json, null, 2);
          pretty.textContent = formatted;
        } catch (e) {
          pretty.textContent = "";
        }
      }
    }
  });

  // initial pretty print
  pretty.textContent = JSON.stringify({ hello: "world", n: 42 }, null, 2);
</script>
```
